[b][size=18pt]Team[/size][/b]
[ul][list] [li]artem543[/li] [li]XlDarkwingLX[/li] [li]iz3 legend[/li] [/list] [hr] [b][size=18pt]Update Log[/size][/b] [list][/list][/ul] [code] Month/Day/Year Name: Description _________________________________________________ 12/19/11 Xion: Project Started 12/19/11 Xion: Ajust to make client compatible. 12/19/11 Xion: Removed all Npc, Shops, Clicks 12/20/11 Xion: Made Near Perfect 525 Gameframe 12/20/11 Xion: Added Killmess's Doors Systems 12/20/11 Xion: Edited Loginscreen 12/20/11 Dylan: Clipped Npc Walking, Npc Clipped Following, And Clipped Walking Home 12/20/11 Dylan: Began Repackaging 12/20/11 Dylan: Finished Mithiril Seeds With Clipped Walking 12/20/11 Dylan: Everyone In The Area Can See And Interact With Objects Now [/code] [hr] [b][size=18pt]Credits[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Graham[/li] [li]Dylan[/li] [li]Artem[/li] [li]DarkWing[/li] [li]lmcTruck[/li] [li]Blakeman[/li] [li]Sanity[/li] [li]Palidino[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b][size=18pt]Support[/size][/b] [b]If you wish be here just say "Good Luck"[/b]
[ul][li]tyb97[/li] [li]TheHolyGrail[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b] [b]Comming soon. (This weekend)[/b]

item.title: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

artem543:

I don’t know what you want to get with your flaming stupid posts. But firstly i don’t even care what a small 17 rep guy is telling. I am working on this. probably it will not be the best of all projects. But i think it would be better then those Dspk’s in the Download section. Even if we add Some Hyperion Classes, it does’not mean so it will be same like Hyperion. Why not use Hyperion? I would use it in my next project, but now i am on PI and if are not happy then just go make your self something. You are like of those guys who claim to be smart ass, but they don’t even have any of good projects. I made this thread to show my progress, And not to get trolled by some simple 10’s reputation people. Maybe reputation don’t tells anything, But for me it does.

Yeah ^ he’s right… C&Ping classes won’t make it stable at all or efficient. If you want to improve stability, rewrite the whole players[] array because it’s retarded as hell, rewrite networking handling, tweak the threading, and tweak the player/npc updating.

Read full topic
item.source: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability

item.title: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability
item.dc:creator: @Kurumu Kurumu
item.description:
@Kurumu wrote:

artem543:

I don’t know what you want to get with your flaming stupid posts. But firstly i don’t even care what a small 17 rep guy is telling. I am working on this. probably it will not be the best of all projects. But i think it would be better then those Dspk’s in the Download section. Even if we add Some Hyperion Classes, it does’not mean so it will be same like Hyperion. Why not use Hyperion? I would use it in my next project, but now i am on PI and if are not happy then just go make your self something. You are like of those guys who claim to be smart ass, but they don’t even have any of good projects. I made this thread to show my progress, And not to get trolled by some simple 10’s reputation people. Maybe reputation don’t tells anything, But for me it does.

Damn, you are silly.
Take this for example. If I want to make a keylogger in Java, copy and pasting dozens of different classes, from different sources, programmed by different programmers isn’t going to work out in the long run. Nor will it be stable.

I’m not trolling, maybe you’re too stupid to see that. Not in any posts am I ‘claiming’ to be a smart arse, even anyone without Java knowledge could laugh at your stupid contradictions.

“Rebuilding PI” with copy & pasta classes from Hyperion. “No Qutting” - yet you were going to quit this project to work on another development team? “The Best Stability” - when you copy and paste classes from other frameworks. It won’t make it stable.

Another fail project by Mr. Artem is all I see. Contradictions, lies, and bullshit.

Read full topic
item.source: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability

Even if we add Some Hyperion Classes, it does’not mean so it will be same like Hyperion. Why not use Hyperion? I would use it in my next project, but now i am on PI and if are not happy then just go make your self something. You are like of those guys who claim to be smart ass, but they don’t even have any of good projects. I made this thread to show my progress, And not to get trolled by some simple 10’s reputation people. Maybe reputation don’t tells anything, But for me it does.

item.title: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability
item.dc:creator: @Kurumu Kurumu
item.description:
@Kurumu wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:37, topic:425579”][quote author=Kurumu link=topic=528237.msg3859524#msg3859524 date=1324589909]

Wait… What happened to rewriting the core features of PI?
Mhm. Just leeching content from completely different frameworks.

C’mon. If you can actually code, then you can do both client and server sided. It doesn’t take a genius to know that.
I’m not talking shit about Artem either. As said, I’ve worked with him previously and he doesn’t explicitly know basic concepts of Java.
[/quote]Well, saying that your coming at us about coding you must be a master coder. Why don’t you recode a core for Project Insanity and we’ll see it’s better then Hyperions kay?[/quote]

Master coder? Your childish flame attacks bewilder me and honestly make me wonder how old you are. It’s not even related to what I said.

Why don’t I recode a core for PI? Firstly, please explain what you mean by core. Secondly, I wouldn’t be stupid enough to add code from all over the fucking place.
Adding classes from Hyperion to PI is completely stupid. You may as well just use Hyperion if that’s the case.

[quote=“runewings317, post:40, topic:425579”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=528237.msg3859577#msg3859577 date=1324591214]
Rep means nothing.
[/quote]When you joined a few days ago and claim you can code like a fucking pro yea it kinda does xD[/quote]

When exactly did I state I was a professional programmer?
I’ve been learning Java since February, and even know I have thousands of hours worth to learn…

Now, back on topic. You’re making fake claims, that’s all I was stating. You claimed you’d rewrite important elements within PI, but copy and paste classes from Hyperion. That means the server wouldn’t have the best stability, and you are not rebuilding PI either.

Then there’s the name of this project. ‘Durathium’. The 'ium’s at end of names is over used, and sounds stupid. Couldn’t you have thought of something, more original?

That isn’t me flaming, that’s the truth, from what is visible at the moment.
If you can’t take constructive criticism, don’t post project threads. That’s what they’re meant for.

Read full topic
item.source: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability

item.title: Durathium - Rebuilding All PI - No Quitting - The Best Stability
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Advocatus, post:44, topic:425579”][quote author=Kurumu link=topic=528237.msg3858983#msg3858983 date=1324546598]
I’ve worked with artem before, he wouldn’t know where to start on rewriting a majority of it.
Also, looking at his recent threads on R-S, he was asking basic questions. Has had like 50 projects he quit at… and of course claims this will be a ‘next gen server’ when he’s using PI, same with the claims of best stability.
[/quote]Meh, I think it is obvious that he can’t do shit or stay focused to one project. Just look at the number of development topics that he has made.

he added the Hyperion core and all.

Lol… hyperion core…[/quote]

Atleast is better then PI core And yeah i had allot of Projects but this one is my main one and i will not Quitting it! Its going pretty fast and very well. I quieted others because i was bored. But i got some Developers and it getting fun when you work actually.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Kurumu, post:36, topic:425579”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=528237.msg3859234#msg3859234 date=1324575542]

[quote author=Kurumu link=topic=528237.msg3858983#msg3858983 date=1324546598]

Don’t support, and never will.
[/quote]OK, but no one really gives a fuck what a 10 REP kiddo that joined yesterday says… Lol

Okay…? A majority of members on here have 200 reputation, doesn’t take a genius to arse kiss for it.

@tyb97
I’ve worked with artem before, he wouldn’t know where to start on rewriting a majority of it.
Also, looking at his recent threads on R-S, he was asking basic questions. Has had like 50 projects he quit at… and of course claims this will be a ‘next gen server’ when he’s using PI, same with the claims of best stability.
[/quote]Stop talking shit about Artem before you know what he’s doing. He’s not server sided dumb ass. He’s client sided. Iz3 Legend is server sided and yes he added the Hyperion core and all.

Wait… What happened to rewriting the core features of PI?
Mhm. Just leeching content from completely different frameworks.

C’mon. If you can actually code, then you can do both client and server sided. It doesn’t take a genius to know that.
I’m not talking shit about Artem either. As said, I’ve worked with him previously and he doesn’t explicitly know basic concepts of Java.[/quote]
I can do both. I am mainly Client But i am codding server too. Please just get out. Your just a small noob with 10 rep crying flaming all projects. What you got? If you cant code… then just keep other do the job. I do know coding java well and if you don’t trust me then i can do nothing… Please, stop doing your smart ass because your not.

Edit: do i even know you?

Read full topic
